title: Come home to Dayton Meadows Apartments! Washer/dryer in unit. Tour today!
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1248/month', 'Location:', '1749 S Dayton St Denver, CO 80247', 'Unit for Rent:', '1-BR 1-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '660 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '◾ 24 hr Emergency Maintenance', '◾ Accepts Credit Cards', '◾ Affordable Housing', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Playground', '◾ Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Mature Landscaping with Lush Foliage', '◾ Online Payments', '◾ Open Field Recreation Area', '◾ Property Manager on Site', '◾ Self-Guided Tours', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '◾ Air Conditioning/Heating', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Range', '◾ Refrigerator', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '◾ LED Lighting', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Vaulted Ceiling', '◾ Views', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Discover Dayton Meadows Apartments.', "You'll find this community at 1749 S Dayton St in Denver.", 'Select from 1 to 3 bedroom floor plans, then call for current pricing.', 'The leasing team is eager to show you our community.', 'Stop by the leasing office to schedule your tour.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dayton Meadows Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household with a 25 pound per pet weight limit.', '$35/pet rent per month.', '$200.00 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Dayton Meadows Apartments:', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '4BF19AAC42004687']
